law.catch_line: The Board shall issue a license to any applicant who, by the affirmative vote of a majority of the f...

text.section: The Board shall issue a license to any applicant who, by the affirmative vote of a majority of the full authorized membership of the Board, meets the requirements of this title.

The Board shall include on each license that the Board issues:
The signature of the Secretary of the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene attesting that the individual meets the requirements of this title; and
A serial number that corresponds to an entry in the registration records of the Board.
